knimeNode.name: Qvx
knimeNode.shortDescription: Developing new nodes in KNIME to read different QVX file formats

fullDescription.intro: transferring new nodes developed in eclipse to knime workspace
fullDescription.option: This is the eclipse bundle activator. Note: KNIME node developers probably won't have to do anything in here, as this class is only needed by the eclipse platform/plugin mechanism. If you want to move/rename this file, make sure to change the plugin.xml file in the project root directory accordingly. This method is called upon plug-in activation.
Developing new nodes in KNIME to read different QVX file formats
This is the model implementation of Qvx. Developing new nodes in KNIME to read different QVX file formats

This node dialog derives from {@link DefaultNodeSettingsPane} which allows creation of a simple dialog with standard components. If you need a more complex dialog please derive directly from {@link org.knime.core.node.NodeDialogPane}.
